remarks: Polynomial evaluation builder for a finite group sum of polynomials. (Contributed by AV, 17-Sep-2019.)
statement:
evl1gsumd.q $e |- O = ( eval1 ` R ) $.
evl1gsumd.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
evl1gsumd.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
evl1gsumd.u $e |- U = ( Base ` P ) $.
evl1gsumd.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) $.
evl1gsumd.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
evl1gsumd.m $e |- ( ph -> A. x e. N M e. U ) $.
evl1gsumd.n $e |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) $.
evl1gsumd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( O ` ( P gsum ( x e. N |-> M ) ) ) ` Y ) = ( R gsum ( x e. N |-> ( ( O ` M ) ` Y ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d N x $.
$d O x $.
$d R x $.
$d R x $.
$d U x $.
$d Y x $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph x $.
